New Docs

  • Title: Overview of the Integrations Module

  • Product: Integrations
  • Product Area: Integrations module
  • Title: Setting Up an Automatic Ingestion Folder on Dropbox
  • Description: Set up a connection to Dropbox and select a folder that Video Cloud will watch to automatically ingest videos placed in the folder. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/integrations-module/watched-folders/dropbox.html
  • Product: Integrations
  • Product Area: Integrations module
  • Title: Setting Up an Automatic Ingestion Folder on Google Drive
  • Description: Set up a connection to Google Drive and select a folder that Video Cloud will watch to automatically ingest videos placed in the folder. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/integrations-module/watched-folders/google-drive.html
  • Product: Integrations
  • Product Area: Integrations module
